title: Devin Solidwood Study Table With Book Rack - Honey
description: The Devin Solidwood Study Table With Book Rack is a stylish addition to your study or bedroom. It is made of kiln-dried and chemically treated Sheesham wood and is extremely strong and stable. The modern design features a book rack along the wall which leads to a horizontal study top supported by a vertical panel. The study top is 18 mm thick and has a length of 33.5 inches at 30 inches from the ground. The bookshelf has two columns as well as a ledge on the top. The study table has a warranty of one year.

title: Paul 2 Seater Dining Set
description: Cleaning Technique Wipe off the dirt from the furniture with a soft cotton cloth. Also avoid using the excess water for cleaning, take moistened cloth to wipe off the dirt.Avoid ChemicalsAvoid chemical contact with the furniture as it may harm the natural finish and further the durability. Also, make sure to avoid application of polyurethane paints on the furniture.Scratch & Burn Remedy Scratches, burns, residue and any other surface damage can be taken off with a fine-grit sandpaper. Reapply mineral oil after sanding.
